headline: Morgan Stanley cuts Ball, sees better earnings revision upside at Crown
summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley downgraded Ball Corporation (NYSE:BALL) to Equal-weight from Overweight. Though the beverage can demand outlook remains solid into 2026 the stock offers less scope for positive earnings revisions than peers.The downgrade is relative rather than fundamental.

content.title: Morgan Stanley cuts Ball, sees better earnings revision upside at Crown
content.summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley downgraded Ball Corporation (NYSE:BALL) to Equal-weight from Overweight. Though the beverage can demand outlook remains solid into 2026 the stock offers less scope for positive earnings revisions than peers.The downgrade is relative rather than fundamental.
